Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class ClientGui

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.ClientGui
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class ClientGui extends javafx.application.Application implements View
The GUI class. Manages all the scenes and is the central point for reaching the backend.

      Returns:
      The generated scene.
      Throws:
